title: Beginner's Fitness Essentials
description: A comprehensive course for newcomers, concentrating on fundamental fitness practices and workout routines.

exercises.title: Walking
exercises.description: Brisk walking exercise for cardio and overall body activation.

exercises.title: Bodyweight Squats
exercises.description: Squat exercise utilizing your body weight to strengthen lower body muscles.

nutrition.breakfast: Start your day with oatmeal and fresh fruits.
nutrition.lunch: Lunch should include lean proteins and salad.
nutrition.dinner: Opt for a light dinner with vegetables and a protein source.

exercises.title: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: Cardio exercise for a full-body workout.

exercises.title: Push-ups
exercises.description: Strengthens upper body muscles.

nutrition.breakfast: Fruits and yogurt make a great morning combo.
nutrition.lunch: Grilled chicken and vegetables for a fulfilling lunch.
nutrition.dinner: Healthy dinner with fish and greens.

exercises.title: Running
exercises.description: Outdoor or treadmill running for endurance.

exercises.title: Plank
exercises.description: Core-strengthening exercise.

nutrition.breakfast: Eggs and toast for a good start to the day.
nutrition.lunch: Protein-rich lunch with beans and veggies.
nutrition.dinner: Light dinner with soup and salad.

exercises.title: Cycling
exercises.description: Cardiovascular workout on a stationary bike or outdoors.

exercises.title: Leg Raises
exercises.description: Strengthens abdominal muscles.

nutrition.breakfast: Healthy smoothie with fruits and nuts.
nutrition.lunch: Quinoa salad with greens and nuts.
nutrition.dinner: Protein-rich dinner with tofu and vegetables.
